content.html: If this couple was you, you are the reason we are still in the pandemic. You are the reason healthcare workers, including my physician husband, are exhausted. The blatant disregard for human life is absolutely disgusting. 2/2
content.value:
If this couple was you, you are the reason we are still in the pandemic.

You are the reason healthcare workers, including my physician husband, are exhausted.

The blatant disregard for human life is absolutely disgusting.

2/2
